name: PHC-WIN
tagline: A PHP encrypter/embeder, written in PHP.
body:
# PHC-WIN #

## What is it? ##

PHC-WIN is a php encrypter/embeder. It takes [multiple] files and combines them into a exe, and embeds php into the exe allowing resdistributable PHP applications.

## Supported OS's ##
  - Windows XP
  - Windows Server 2003
  - Windows Vista
  - Windows 7
  - Windows 8

## Authors ##
  - [frantik] (http://swiftlytilting.com) Original Maintainer
  - [RainbowDashDC] (http://rainbowdashdc.com) Current Maintainer.
  
## License ##
GNUGPLv3

## Compiling from source ##
Download master.

Download latest redist.

Compile phc-win.php, with phc_make, in seperate directory (for now). http://bit.ly/phc_make

Extract redist.

## Config, and other files. ##
They will be moved into exe on each release.

## Donate ##
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
